File /std/shops/vault.c

Standard vault inheritable object. There are two inheritables (this one and /std/vault_entry.c) which are provided to make it easy to setup your own vaults. This one handles the actual vault room itself. When using this room you must use set_vault_name and set_vault_entrance. You should also define a setup_container function to customise your vault drawers.

See also:
/std/vault_entrance.c

Written by Ceres

This class inherits the following classes /std/room/basic_room.c

set_vault_exit
void set_vault_exit(string direc,
mixed dest,
string type)
Used to set the exit from this vault room (usually out to the vault entry room. The parameters are just like those of add_exit.

Parameters:
direction - The direction of the exit.
dest - The destination object. Usually the filename of the destination.
type - An exit type as in add_exit.
Returns:
void

setup_container
void setup_container(object container)
Define this function in your vault room to perform setup on the vault container. Use it to customise the name, short, long, size etc. of your drawers (or whatever your vault uses.

Parameters:

Returns:
void
